title: Fill-ins/Replacements for afkers.
body:
Due to afking/dcing being such a common occurence i feel it would be only fair if riot added a queue for people to join a game whenever somebody dc'd for too long, even 10 minutes, at least you'd know that help was coming if you were the 4 people left.

And it is quite a viable idea that i have, all that riot would have to do is make it so when you join the game you know who you're playing as them you could accept it and load in, and once you were in-game you would just borrow the dc'd persons runes/masteries/summoers for the duration of the match.

Basically, it'd be a very undesirable queue that would be super unused.

and im yet to see somebody with a better idea, feel free to throw one of those out there, because simply leaving people to lose games based on others disconnecting is not a fair system.
